TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit Saml2SecurityTokenHandler extends System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityTokenHandler

summary.span: 表示安全标记处理程序，其可从 SAML 2.0 Assertions 创建安全标记。

span.span: Represents a security token handler that creates security tokens from SAML 2.0 Assertions.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 类序列化和反序列化安全令牌由 SAML 2.0 断言到对象。The class serializes and deserializes security tokens backed by SAML 2.0 Assertions into objects. 安全令牌处理程序负责创建、 读取、 写入和验证令牌。Security token handlers are responsible for creating, reading, writing, and validating tokens. 你可以配置安全令牌服务 (STS)，或者通过将实例添加信赖方 (RP) 应用程序处理支持 SAML 2.0 断言的安全令牌类到配置服务 （或应用程序） 的对象。You can configure a security token service (STS) or relying party (RP) application to process SAML 2.0 Assertion-backed security tokens by adding an instance of the class to the object configured for the service (or application). 可以以编程方式或配置文件中完成此操作。This can be done either programmatically or in the configuration file. 处理程序本身配置为通过集合的集合指定的配置从属性添加到集合时。The handler itself is configured from the configuration specified for the collection through the collection’s property when it is added to the collection. 虽然可能通过设置单独配置处理程序，但其属性，这不是，通常需要; 但是，如果必须单独配置处理程序，该属性应设置后该处理程序添加到集合。While it is possible to configure the handler individually by setting its property, this is not normally necessary; however, if the handler must be configured individually, the property should be set after the handler is added to the collection. 对于许多方案，类可用作-; 但是，此类提供通过方法它公开点的多个扩展。For many scenarios, the class can be used as-is; however, the class provides many extension points through the methods it exposes. 通过从派生和重写特定方法，你可以修改的默认实现中提供的令牌处理功能，或可以将扩展的处理添加到可能需要在的 SAML 断言规范某些自定义方案。By deriving from the and overriding specific methods, you can modify the functionality of the token processing provided in the default implementation, or you can add processing for extensions to the SAML Assertion specification that may be needed in some custom scenarios.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 通常情况下，条件应包括在断言，以限制被误用的断言的影响。Generally, conditions should be included in assertions to limit the impact of misuse of the assertion. 指定的条件 NotBefore 和 NotOnOrAfter 条件可以限制在泄露断言的情况下的漏洞的时间长度。Specifying the NotBefore and NotOnOrAfter conditions can limit the period of vulnerability in the case of a compromised assertion. 可以使用 AudienceRestrictionCondition 以显式声明预期的信赖方或断言，结合的限制实施适当的受众的信赖方方可以帮助缓解之间信赖的欺骗攻击当事方。The AudienceRestrictionCondition can be used to explicitly state the intended relying party or parties of the assertion, which coupled with appropriate audience restriction enforcement at relying parties can help to mitigate spoofing attacks between relying parties. 默认实现将创建基于的 NotBefore 和 NotOnOrAfter 条件属性`tokenDescriptor`。The default implementation creates NotBefore and NotOnOrAfter conditions based on the property of the `tokenDescriptor`. 它还将生成限制到断言消耗 AudienceRestrictionCondition属性`tokenDescriptor`。It will also generate an AudienceRestrictionCondition limiting consumption of the assertion to the property of the `tokenDescriptor`.
